pages.content: TestExtension is a fictional MediaWiki extension used for wikitool testbench validation. It provides searchable content for docs search testing. Configuration: $wgTestExtensionEnable = true;
Configuration options for TestExtension. Set $wgTestExtensionDebug to enable debug logging. The extension supports both SQLite and MySQL backends.

technical.content: TestHook is called during testbench validation. Parameters: $parser (Parser object), $text (string, wikitext content). Return true to continue processing.
